articles.author: Yasmeen Abutaleb
articles.title: At least 17 million Americans would lose insurance under Trump plan - The Washington Post
articles.description: GOP legislation would set back years of progress in expanding health care coverage, unwinding key parts of President Barack Obama’s Affordable Care Act.
articles.content: The Senate version of President Donald Trumps massive tax and immigration spending plan would wipe out many of the strides made by the Affordable Care Act in reducing the number of uninsured American… [+6585 chars]
